origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail', 'description': 'Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': ''}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'company address'}, {'name': 'homepage_url', 'description': ''}, {'name': 'description', 'description': 'A description of the company and what they do/offer'}, {'name': 'list_date', 'description': 'The date that the symbol was first publicly listed'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.search_stock_ticker', 'description': 'get the stock ticker given the company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'GovernmentPortal.get_tax_reform_announcement', 'description': 'Get the latest government announcement regarding tax reforms', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'tax_type', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the type of tax reform announcement needed'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'announcement', 'description': 'the text of the latest tax reform announcement'}]}, {'name': 'LocalTaxPortal.get_tax_rate', 'description': 'Get the current tax rate for a specific tax type in a given region', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'tax_type', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the type of tax rate needed'}, {'name': 'region', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the region where the tax rate is applicable'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'tax_rate', 'description': 'the current tax rate'}]}, {'name': 'ElectronicTaxBureau.get_tax_filing_instructions', 'description': 'Get instructions on how to file a specific tax type through the electronic tax bureau', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'tax_type', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the type of tax filing instructions needed'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'instructions', 'description': 'the instructions for filing the tax electronically'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我需要了解中国城市维护建设税的最新动态。首先，获取最新的关于城市维护建设税改革的政府公告。然后，分析这些政策对城市建设和维护的影响。接着，查询我所在地区的城市维护建设税率。最后，了解如何通过电子税务局进行城市维护建设税的申报。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取最新的关于城市维护建设税改革的政府公告
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'tax_type'的值是什么?
{'announcement': 'The government has announced a new reform on city maintenance and construction tax, aiming to increase funding for urban infrastructure and maintenance projects.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'announcement': 'The government has announced a new reform on city maintenance and construction tax, aiming to increase funding for urban infrastructure and maintenance projects.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?

prediction: 分析这些政策对城市建设和维护的影响。
